title: Langchain: Building Impressive Demos with Elixir and Safe Ecto Migrations
content:
In the latest episode of the Thinking Elixir podcast, hosts Mark and David discuss Langchain, a popular framework in the JS and Python communities for building services that integrate different services. Langchain enables developers to quickly create impressive demos by seamlessly connecting various components.

Mark shares his interest in Langchain and how he has been working on incorporating Elixir apps into this framework. He also discusses his ideas on using Oban for managing data migrations in a new and efficient way.

For developers looking to explore Langchain and leverage its capabilities, this episode provides valuable insights and ideas. Tune in to the podcast to learn more about Langchain and its potential for building powerful demos.

Listen to the full episode and access additional resources at the Thinking Elixir website.

Don't miss out on the latest news and discussions in the Elixir community! Follow @ThinkingElixir on Twitter or email your news to show@thinkingelixir.com.
